translations: v．缺席，离开：不在某地或某活动中出现。
· He was absenting himself from the meeting.

sentences.sentence: To ignore the body is absenting ourselves from one of the greatest joys.
sentences.translation: 忽视身体，你将缺席宇宙中巨大喜悦。

sentences.sentence: It was hither that Marius had come on the first occasion of his absenting himself from Paris.
sentences.translation: 这便是马吕斯第一次离开巴黎时来到的地方。
